verbose_text: To assess whether loss of LKB1 farnesylation affected membrane localization, we fractionated liver and MEF (XREF_FIG G, upper and lower panel respectively) extracts, derived from littermate wild-type and LKB1 C433S / C433S knockin mice, into cytoplasmic, membrane and nuclear fractions and analysed the relative levels of LKB1 by immunoblot analysis.
